work_habits.meeting_preferences: Limits to 2‑3 scheduled meetings per week; prefers 15‑minute stand‑ups and agenda‑driven sessions
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid – 3 days in office (Boston HQ), 2 days remote
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: 4‑5 hours of uninterrupted focus per day, usually in the morning

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven with a strategic long‑term view; consults stakeholders for high‑impact choices
personality.risk_tolerance: Moderate – comfortable with experimental models but requires validation before production
personality.collaboration_style: Selective collaborator; deep‑dives with small expert groups rather than large crowds
personality.stress_management_approach: Scheduled micro‑breaks, short walks, and weekly yoga session
personality.conflict_resolution_style: Direct yet diplomatic; focuses on facts and seeks win‑win outcomes

availability.travel_flexibility: Moderate – up to 10% travel (≈5 weeks/year), prefers short trips

personal_factors.caregiving_responsibilities: Shared with spouse; occasional morning childcare duties
personal_factors.commute_situation: 30‑minute drive to Boston office, occasional traffic delays
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild hypertension, managed with medication and lifestyle; avoids late‑night work
personal_factors.career_motivation: Desire to shape AI strategy at scale, mentor the next generation, and deliver measurable business impact

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: Bi‑weekly team sync + ad‑hoc when needed; avoids daily meetings
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct but diplomatic; provides data‑backed suggestions
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Publishes detailed Jupyter notebooks, writes quarterly white‑papers, runs monthly brown‑bag talks

potential_bottlenecks: Heavy reliance on his expertise for model validation could cause delays if he’s unavailable
Limited early‑morning availability due to family routine
burnout_risk_factors: Extended periods of deep focus without breaks
Travel combined with tight sprint cycles
